title: Dennis O'Hoy: Bendigo Born and Bred

video_links.name: Dennis O'Hoy: Bendigo Born and Bred

brief_description: Interview for the MAP project with lifelong Bendigo resident, Dennis O’Hoy, about his family history in the area, and his great love of, and identification with, the place where he lives.
description: Interview for the MAP project with lifelong Bendigo resident, Dennis O’Hoy, about his family history in the area, and his great love of, and identification with, the place where he lives.
